title: What is Kitana Tweak?
description: Kitana Tweak is a modification for android devices that increase the performance, extend battery life, reduce lags on your device. With a clean, fresh user interface

title: Requirements
description: Root access, Busybox installed (only for superSU user), Terminal Emulator application (Not Termux), 5MB free space Of system

title: Warning!!!
description: Your warranty is now void. I am not responsible for bricked devices, dead SD cards, corrupted partition, nuclear disasters. Please do some research before using this mod!

title: How to install?
description: Uninstall Old Version, download Latest zip version, boot into recovery & flash the zip

title: How to use?
description: Open Terminal Emulator application (Not Termux), Type su then Type KITANA Done

title: How to uninstall?
description:
For Magisk User:- Open magisk manager > Modules > Select Kitana > Tap to trash icon > Reboot.

For SuperSU user:- Open Terminal > Type su & KITANA > Press u and hit enter > Reboot
